title: Game crashes when i attempt to change the resolution.
body: Every time i try to change the resolution the  screen turns black and flickers continuously until it just bug splats. When i load into the next game the resolution is back onto the one i tried to change in the first place. Rito pls

replies.body: What is the native resolution of your display and what resolution are you trying to change your in-game settings to? It may be a resolution your card or display cannot work with, but I'll need some more information.

Native is 1366 x 768
I've been playing on 1024x768 for years without issue. If i play on any other resolution i experience fps lag.

If you're running Windows 10, there were some recent updates pushed out by Microsoft that cause strange interactions if you aren't running Windows and League resolutions at your display's native. I recommend changing your resolution to your display's native both in League and [in Windows.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html)

After changing Windows' resolution to your native, complete a reset of your input file stored server-side by following these directions:

First, log in to League, then delete the folder name **CONFIG** in the following directory:
> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

After deleting that folder, hop into a custom match to ensure your resolution is set correctly. Let me know if this resolved your issue.
Wow it worked! Thanks a ton.

I get the same problem but I am running a 4k monitor and it wont let me back in the game. I have to reinstall the game every time. and the resolution is so high the health bars are so small I have a problem last hitting minions and the cursor is so small i cant seem to see it in team fights. not sure what to do.
